archimate:BusinessFunction.name: Integration
archimate:BusinessFunction.documentation:
As stated in ISO/IEC/IEEE 15288, [6.4.8.1] The purpose of the Integration process is to synthesize a set of system elements into a realized system (product or service) that satisfies system requirements, architecture, and design.
See detailed description in the INCOSE Handbook v.4, page 79

properties.value: As stated in ISO/IEC/IEEE 15288, [6.4.8.1] The purpose of the Integration process is to synthesize a set of system elements into a realized system (product or service) that satisfies system requirements, architecture, and design.
